stance_1: Affordability limits my meat choices
stance_2: Animal welfare is important to me
justification: The interviewee explicitly states that financial constraints prevent them from prioritizing animal welfare in their meat purchases.

stance_2: I buy cheaper meat due to financial constraints
justification: The interviewee directly links affordability constraints to buying cheaper meat.

stance_1: Affordability limits my meat choices
stance_2: I focus on meat quality within my budget

stance_1: Affordability limits my meat choices

stance_1: Animal welfare is important to me
